title: Industry Principal, Healthcare & Life Sciences - EMEA
content:
Build the future of data. Join the Snowflake team.Snowflake is actively seeking an Industry Principal, Healthcare & Life Sciences to join our Global Industry Go-to-Market team.
Our Global GTM Industry team is responsible for accelerating market share and executing strategic GTM initiatives across the company. Reporting to the Global Industry GTM Lead, Healthcare & Life Sciences, you will act as a visionary and an innovative industry expert and apply your successful track record of building, overseeing, and developing enterprise software go-to-market strategies for Healthcare & Life Sciences.
In particular, this role will focus on working across the European & Middle East (EMEA) geographies with our integrated Field Sales & Marketing leaders to plan, develop & execute GTM sales growth initiatives.  You will work closely with current and prospective customers, partners, and market opinion leaders as a trusted industry advisor to deeply understand their challenges and goals.  
What you bring: You love to compete and build markets by combining strategy with execution. You ‘play for your teammates’ and roll up your sleeves. You have a passion for the role of technology.  You are most comfortable engaging in activities that when successful, bring great benefit to people.  You are a difference-maker and have an appreciation for the skillful execution needed to build a world-class software company.
IN THIS ROLE YOU WILL GET TO:

Have direct involvement with our Healthcare & Life Sciences customers and partners to develop and execute successful market plans, build successful relationships, and present Snowflake’s vision for the Industry to Executive & Institutional leaders.  
Develop a library of Healthcare & Life Sciences use cases for Snowflake and be able to confidently evangelize these with customers, prospects and partners.
Partner with the global sales leaders and sales strategy teams to drive a cohesive industry go-to-market strategy.  
Work with sales, product, compliance, legal and other cross functional teams to design and develop country / region-specific roadmaps, customer-facing content and execution plans, leveraging best practices and subject matter expertise. 
Develop and deploy an enablement strategy to build a strong foundation of industry knowledge within the organization
Collaborate with our product teams to prioritize and deliver industry-specific capabilities in future product roadmaps and drive Snowflake’s Global Healthcare & Life Sciences product vision into the market
Partner with marketing teams to provide thought leadership, drive industry awareness and pipeline development
Oversee account prioritization, solution and sales play creation to help educate and enable sales, sales engineers, pre-sales and customer success teams.
Collaborate with partner and alliance teams to identify, recruit, and enable industry-specific system integrators and ISV partners 

ON DAY ONE WE WILL EXPECT YOU TO HAVE

15+ years of industry experience working in, selling to, consulting to, or implementing technology for the Healthcare & Life Sciences industry.  Particular experience with industry solutions, presales and/or product marketing is highly preferred; Experience in high growth B2B Software, Platform and/or IaaS environments is highly preferred
Be well-versed in the overall challenges and opportunities impacting the Healthcare & Life Sciences industry
Experience with data-platform, analytics or business intelligence technology strongly preferred
Experience working directly with C-level executives and an ability to quickly establish credibility with senior leadership
Undergraduate degree, advanced degree preferred
The ability to travel across EMEA

questions.label: Where have you most recently worked?
Have you worked at Snowflake in the past in a Full-time, Part-time, contractor or Intern capacity?
For Snowflake to anticipate possible immigration timelines and obligations, could you confirm you are currently authorized to work in the country to which you are applying?

Will you require sponsorship to continue or extend your current work authorization status, either now or in the future (Example – including but not limited to: work permits such as H-1B in the United States, Highly Skilled Migrant in the Netherlands or a Blue Card in Poland or Germany. This could also include change of sponsorship from your current employer to Snowflake)?
A “U.S. person” is a citizen, legal permanent resident, or legal temporary resident (i.e., a refugee or asylee) of the United States. Which of the following best describes your “U.S. person” status?

values.label: I am a citizen of Cuba, Iran, North Korea, or Syria AND I am NOT a U.S. person.
None of the above; I am a citizen of a different country.

questions.label: [US Applicants Only] Are you subject to any post-employment restrictions based on your role as a government (federal, state, local, or otherwise) employee or contractor, including representational restrictions or restrictions arising from work on a government procurement?
Due to SEC auditor independence requirements, please let us know whether you have previously worked at, or if currently working at PricewaterhouseCoopers (PwC), who is our independent auditor.

values.label: Yes - I have previously worked at, or is currently working at PwC.
No - I have never been employed by PwC.

questions.description: When you apply to a job on this site, the personal data contained in your application will be collected by Snowflake. Your personal data will be processed for the purposes of managing Snowflake’s recruitment related activities, which include setting up and conducting interviews and tests for applicants, evaluating and assessing the results thereto, and as is otherwise needed in the recruitment and hiring processes. Such processing is legally permissible under Art. 6(1)(f) of Regulation (EU) 2016/679 (General Data Protection Regulation) as necessary for the purposes of the legitimate interests pursued by Snowflake, which are the solicitation, evaluation, and selection of applicants for employment. Snowflake will share your personal data with Greenhouse Software, Inc., a cloud services provider located in the United States of America and engaged by Snowflake to help manage its recruitment and hiring process on Snowflake’s behalf. Accordingly, if you are located outside of the United States, your personal data will be transferred to the United States once you submit it through this site and such transfer will be subject to appropriate safeguards under standard contractual clauses as approved by the European Union Commission and/or the Privacy Shield framework. Further information about how Snowflake processes your personal data can be found in our Privacy Notice (the term “privacy notice” to be a link to our privacy notice located at https://www.snowflake.com/privacy-policy/ ). Your personal data will be retained by Snowflake as long as we determine it is necessary to evaluate your application for employment. You have the right to data portability, to request access to your personal data, to request that your personal data be rectified or erased, and to request that processing of your personal data be restricted. Such requests can be made by contacting us at privacy@snowflake.com.
questions.label: Point of Data Transfer
